scripts.build:ui: npx lerna bootstrap --scope=@soonaverse/ui && lerna run build --scope=@soonaverse/ui --include-dependencies
scripts.build:functions: npx lerna bootstrap --scope=@soonaverse/functions && lerna run build --scope=@soonaverse/functions --include-dependencies
scripts.build:interfaces: npx lerna bootstrap --scope=@soonaverse/interfaces && lerna run build --scope=@soonaverse/interfaces --include-dependencies
scripts.build:lib: npx lerna bootstrap --scope=@soonaverse/lib && lerna run build --scope=@soonaverse/lib --include-dependencies
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules; npm run clean:functions; npm run clean:interfaces; npm run clean:lib; npm run clean:ui
scripts.prettier: npm run prettier:functions; npm run prettier:interfaces; npm run prettier:indexes; npm run prettier:lib; npm run prettier:ui
